fields.text:
Azeri Student fairs is the best in the region. We get very good
                        quality of students during the fair.

fields.name: Language courses (English, German, French, Spanish and other languages) in the best language
Language courses for children in USA, Canada and Europe, where education is combined with sport

fields.title: Azeri Student
fields.content: We, Azerbaijani’s leading educational counseling agency, were founded in 2008. Since 2008, we’ve had more than 5.000 students whom we place at the universities (foundation,undergraduate and graduate), language schools,high schools and colleges. Our students studied in various countries such as United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, Malta, New Zealand, Spain, Italy, Germany, Holland, Switzerland, China and France.z

fields.title: What we do
fields.content: Our managers have been working in this industry more than 3-5 years and most of them are British Council accredited agents (check) . We have a good network of partners from the main study destinations, however we are always open to new partnerships and cooperation. If your educational institution is ready for beneficial cooperation we would love to hear from you!

fields.title: Our Education events
fields.content: We organise the biggest educational exhibitions in Azerbaijan, Ukraine and Georgia twice a year. Our events are attended by more than 30 partners who are normally kept busy over 4 days with more than 2000 visitors!

fields.title: Our marketing for you
fields.content: We are marketingly active over the whole year. In addition to the exhibitions we prepare 150-page Catalogues “Azeri Student magazine” and “Student Study”. We also produce extra brochures and leaflets and distribute them in the universities, local banks, schools, sport centres and so on.

fields.title: About
fields.content:
We, Azerbaijani’s leading educational counseling agency, were founded in 2008. Since 2008, we’ve had more than 5.000 students whom we place at the universities (foundation, undergraduate and graduate), language schools, high schools and colleges. Our students studied in various countries such as United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, Malta, New Zealand, Spain, Italy, Germany, Holland, Switzerland, China and France.

We’re running educational fairs in Azerbaijan, Ukraine and Georgia 2 times in a year.

We’re the founder of the future of education counseling service, Azeri Student, which is the most unique educational web site (www.azeristudent.az)

We’ve opened our 3rd office. Now, Azeri Student has offices not only in Baku, but also in Ukraine and Georgia.

We’ve been working with prestigious institutions all around the world such as St. Andrews University, Brunel University London, Reading University, Lancaster University, Leicester University, Aberdeen University, Robert Gordon University, University of Surrey, Anglia Ruskin University, Royal Holloway University London, Exeter University, Aberystwyth University, Glion London, Les Roches institute of Hotel Management , EU business school, Glasgow University, Cambridge Education Group, Study Group, Navitas, Shorelight group universities … and more!

We’ve had our own language schools in Azerbaijan and Educational Magazine.

If you want to be a part of first Europe’s, then World’s upcoming leading counseling agency, please contact with us!

Skype: Azeri Student

e-mail: info@azeristudent.az

Sincerely Yours,

Rasim Allahverdiyev

CEO

Azeri Student Education Counseling Services

00994505122828

00994502917999

00994124886678

fields.title: Feel free to call us or email.
Our Address
fields.content: Nobel Avenue 15, Azure Business Center 20th floor office 135, AZ1025 Baku, Azerbaijan

fields.title: Fall Fair in 3 Countries
fields.content:
Dear partner,

We would like to invite you to participate on our roadshow fair in Azerbaijan, Georgia and Ukraine in October 2017. October is a perfect time to visit these countries as students are still in the process of making their application, some are making up their decision.

Participation fee for all three countries includes all the expenses of your travel.

  • Accommodation at 5 star hotel
  • Food and beverage
  • Flight tickets
  • Visa
  • Paid advertisement on social media

Please contact Mr. Anar (anar@azeristudent.az) for more information about participation fee.
